title: Pyrolysis study of a waste plastic mixture through different kinetic models using isothermal and nonisothermal mechanism
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,25599-25618
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04957H, Paper
Open Access

Prasanta Das
We report the solid fuel WPM (Waste Plastic Mixture) characterization, the physico-chemical properties of the pyrolytic oil, and the pyrolysis investigation of WPM using several kinetic models.
